siteMetadata.title: Aaron Van Bokhoven - Software Developer
siteMetadata.subtitle: Software developer working with Ruby, Go, and JavaScript. Hobbyist street photographer and climber.

frontmatter.title: Recurring resque and redis with cron
frontmatter.description: Moving one of my projects over from delayed_job to resque/redis, for reasons I wont go into here, I needed to have a few of my workers on a cron job.
